page.title: 07Kathryn's Story
page.content: {Pages 7 & 8 show stories (shortened) {by 11 year olds in an English lesson.} Outside it was snowing but inside the heat and warmth glowed out of the frosted windows. Cheers and shouts drowned the noise outside of a car beeping its horn angrily. As she walked her stiletto heels echoed on the wooden floor. She glanced at the audience. Two children were in the front row. Behind them sat their parents. Dad in a long coat, mum watching silently. The lady pulled up her flowing skirt and sat gracefully down. A little child at the back stood on a chair in an effort to see. She picked up her music case and the black notes on the carved piano blurred from view. As she lifted her fingers her ring slipped down a little. Then she struck the keyboard. The room was silent except for music.
